Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SyncManager.SyncUpdateCallback
    Callback to get sync status udpates
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheManager
    This class provides APIs to store and retrieve Salesforce object metadata, object layouts and MRU objects from a simple cache.
    MetadataManager
    This class contains APIs to fetch Salesforce object metadata, recently used objects, and other object related data.
    SyncManager
    Sync Manager
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CacheManager.CachePolicy
    This enum defines different possible cache policies.
    SyncManager.Action
    Enum for action
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SyncManager.SmartSyncException
    Exception thrown by smart sync manager
